attributes.title: Max and Christina Find God - #171
attributes.caption: Max and Christina find a new god to worship and Garfield still hates Mondays.
attributes.show_title: On the Spot: For The Win

attributes.title: You Look Like a Bag of Moose - #172
attributes.caption: The cast tries out a new game and almost dies from laughter, and then Burnie almost dies from heat exhaustion.
attributes.description: The cast tries out a new game and almost dies from laughter, and then Burnie almost dies from heat exhaustion.

attributes.title: Zach Wins - #174
attributes.caption: The gang brainstorms the next hit sitcom that may or may not be a retelling of World War 2, but this time Zach wins.

attributes.title: We Write Doctor Who - #175

attributes.title: We Broke Ellie - #176

attributes.title: You're Probably Having A Stroke - #177

attributes.title: Bring Back Sun 2020 - #180
